issue.title: [R] Make docker-compose setup faster
issue.body:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6918?focusedCommentId=16953825) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
https://github.com/rstudio/r-builds could help skip some steps, but I haven't looked at what exactly is slow (I don't personally use docker for R).
